text: E'ina hu'negu zamagrama koro'ma nehaza knazana ko huhampri zamante'noanki'na, atrenugeno zamagrite egahie. Na'ankure Nagrama kema hu'noana mago'mo'e huno kenona osigeno, kema nehugeno'a mago'mo'e huno nagri kea ontahine. Nagri navurera kefo avu'ava nehu'za nagrama musema nosua zamavuzmava nehaze.
